ValidationRule.description: Before moving to Closed Won, the First Month of Data field must be completed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', RecordType.Name = 'Proprietary', ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Closed Won'), ISBLANK( First_Month_of_Data__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Before moving to Closed Won, the First Month of Data field must be completed.
